channel.title: Does running a private server open up my computer to attack?
channel.description: I've hosted private servers before, but on my own computer. My computer recently broke and I want to use the computer the whole family uses to host a server, but my dad says running a server opens up my computer to attack because of the open ports you need. Could anyone please explain to me if running a private server is safe or not? If it isn't safe to run one, could you please explain to me exactly why it is not safe so I can understand a bit more; and if it is, could you please explain why also? Thanks in advance.

item.title: Does running a private server open up my computer to attack?

@Mr_Firecape wrote:

thought you said you cant sorry, i agree vps might be the best way 2 gao

item.title: Does running a private server open up my computer to attack?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Firecape Mr Firecape
item.description:
@Mr_Firecape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Mr Firecape link=topic=500373.msg3659347#msg3659347 date=1310252362]
I wouldnt worry to much bout ports,i would worry about getting ddosed if u dont have no-ip and u just put you’re ip into client.java, really nothing to worry about if you’re a dick people might ddos you but otherwise no.
[/quote]You can get people’s IP using their No-IP dynamic address.[/quote]
You can get there ip adresss if you put it in instead of no-ip.biz example server = (“99.245.124.56”) there go into client then look for client.java then its there.

Read full topic

@tztk wrote:

I’ve hosted private servers before, but on my own computer. My computer recently broke and I want to use the computer the whole family uses to host a server, but my dad says running a server opens up my computer to attack because of the open ports you need. Could anyone please explain to me if running a private server is safe or not? If it isn’t safe to run one, could you please explain to me exactly why it is not safe so I can understand a bit more; and if it is, could you please explain why also? Thanks in advance.
